DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose study evaluate body process study drug know insulin peglispro study drug affect blood sugar healthy male Japanese participant . This study also evaluate safety study drug . The study last 46 day participant , include screening .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Insulin Peglispro Healthy Male Japanese Participants
DOC.criteria: Participants overtly healthy male Japanese . Participants Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 18.5 25.0 kilogram per square meter ( kg/m^2 ) , inclusive . Participants know allergy insulin peglispro , related compound . Participants fast venous blood glucose > 108 milligram per deciliter ( mg/dL ) ( > 6 millimole per liter [ mmol/L ] ) .
